# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_triggers/godherja/GH_hunt_triggers.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

# For semi-shallow aquatic creatures
is_coastal_sea_province = {
	AND = {
		is_sea_province = yes	
		any_neighboring_province = {
			is_coastal = yes
			exists = county
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_animal_hare_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_hare_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_hare_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_white_hare_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_desert_hare_trigger = yes
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_hare_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hare
		GH_hunt_activity_rabbit_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_brown_hare_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_white_hare_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_desert_hare_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = kalathipsomi_biozone
				geographical_region = vyshtanka_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_rabbit_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rabbit
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			NOR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_eastern_deer_trigger = yes
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_true_deer_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:true_deer
		GH_hunt_activity_red_deer_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_eastern_deer_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_deer_region
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_tragoneian_stag_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_red_deer_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_deer
		GH_hunt_activity_reacher_red_deer_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_tragoneian_stag_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

			OR = {

				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes

	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_hog_deer_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	}

}

GH_hunt_activity_hog_deer_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hog_deer
		GH_hunt_activity_chital_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_chital_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_chital_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_chital_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_chital_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_chital_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chital
	}
}

	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_dire_stag_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_dire_stag_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dire_stag
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_antelope_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_antelope_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_antelope_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_antelope_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_oryx_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_screwhorn_antelope_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_saiga_trigger = yes
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_antelope_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_antelope_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:antelope
		GH_hunt_activity_blackbuck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_gazelle_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_oryx_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_screwhorn_antelope_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_saiga_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_blackbuck_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:blackbuck
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_gazelle_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gazelle
		GH_hunt_activity_white_gazelle_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_white_gazelle_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_gazelle
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_oryx_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_oryx_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_oryx_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}

				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20

GH_hunt_animal_saiga_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_saiga_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_saiga_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_saiga_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = great_steppe_biozone
				geographical_region = brass_sea_coasts_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_saiga_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:saiga
	}
}

		}

			}
			OR = {

			}

				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = magiyor_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = katuppilan_biozone

				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes

		}

	}

	GH_hunt_animal_elephantid_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_elephantid_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

		GH_hunt_animal_elephant_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}

GH_hunt_animal_mammoth_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_mammoth_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mammoth
		GH_hunt_activity_wooly_mammoth_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_daggertusk_mammoth_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = migraddar_biozone
				geographical_region = vyshtanka_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_wooly_mammoth_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wooly_mammoth
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = vyshtanka_biozone
				geographical_region = continental_interior_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_daggertusk_mammoth_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:daggertusk_mammoth
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_elephant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_elephant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_elephant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_elephant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:elephant
		GH_hunt_activity_damotan_elephant_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_sarradonian_elephant_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_kashiryan_elephant_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_dwarf_elephant_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_damotan_elephant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:damotan_elephant
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_sarradonian_elephant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sarradonian_elephant
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = nattanan_highlands_biozone
				geographical_region = nightcoast_biozone
				geographical_region = rovarska_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 35
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_kashiryan_elephant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_elephant
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_dwarf_elephant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dwarf_elephant
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_aurochs_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_aurochs_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_aurochs_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_aurochs_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_aurochs_region
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_aurochs_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_aurochs_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:aurochs
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_fox_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_fox_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_fox_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_fox_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fox
		GH_hunt_activity_red_fox_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_sand_fox_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_fennec_fox_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
			}
			NOR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_red_fox_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_fox
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = boneyard_biozone
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_mountains_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_sand_fox_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_fox
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = boneyard_biozone
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_mountains_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_fennec_fox_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fennec_fox
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_pig_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_pig_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_pig_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_pig_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_boar_region
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_boar_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_dire_boar_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_warthog_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_pig_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_pig_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:pig
		GH_hunt_activity_boar_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_dire_boar_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_warthog_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_boar_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_boar_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_boar_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_boar_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_boar_region
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_boar_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_boar_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:boar
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_dire_boar_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_dire_boar_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_dire_boar_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_boar_region
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes

			}
		}
	}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dire_boar
	}

	GH_hunt_animal_warthog_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_warthog_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_warthog_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}

}

GH_hunt_activity_warthog_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:warthog
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_canine_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_canine_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_canine_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_canine_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_wolf_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_jackal_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_lymrill_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_crocotta_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_apep-ibizan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_kursha_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_canine_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_canine_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:canine
		GH_hunt_activity_wolf_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_steppe_wolf_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_jackal_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_lymrill_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_crocotta_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_apep-ibizan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_kursha_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_wolf_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_wolf_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wolf_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wolf_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_hunt_animal_wolf_region
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_wolf_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_wolf_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wolf
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = great_steppe_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = fools_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = brass_sea_coasts_biozone
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_steppe_wolf_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:steppe_wolf
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_jackal_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_jackal_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_jackal_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_jackal_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_dahangon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_jackal_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_jackal_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:jackal
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_lymrill_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_lymrill_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

		AND = {
			OR = {

			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}

	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }

	GH_hunt_animal_hyena_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_hyena_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_hyena_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_hyena_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hyena
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_bear_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_bear_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_bear_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_bear_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_aervalrbear_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_sun_bear_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_sloth_bear_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_owlbear_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_bear_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_bear_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bear
		GH_hunt_activity_brown_bear_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_aervalrbear_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_sun_bear_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_sloth_bear_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_owlbear_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
				geographical_region = kalathipsomi_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			NOR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			NOR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_brown_bear_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_bear
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_aervalrbear_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_aervalrbear_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_aervalrbear_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes

	GH_hunt_animal_big_cat_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_big_cat_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_big_cat_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_lion_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_tinessian_lion_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_leopard_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_snow_leopard_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_tiger_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_clouded_leopard_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_caracal_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_cheetah_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_lynx_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_panther_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_fossa_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_big_cat_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:big_cat
		GH_hunt_activity_lion_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_tinessian_lion_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_leopard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_snow_leopard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_tiger_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_clouded_leopard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_caracal_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_cheetah_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_lynx_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_panther_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_fossa_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_lion_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_lion_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_lion_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_lion_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_lion_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_lion_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:lion
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_tinessian_lion_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_tinessian_lion_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_tinessian_lion_native_range_trigger = {

				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes

				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}

		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}

	OR = {

	}

GH_hunt_animal_leopard_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_leopard_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_leopard_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_leopard_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = rojihlat_biozone
				geographical_region = cyrat_biozone
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_dahangon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_leopard_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_leopard_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:leopard
	}
}

				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_clouded_leopard_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_clouded_leopard_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:clouded_leopard
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_caracal_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_caracal_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_caracal_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_caracal_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_equatorial_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_northern_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_caracal_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_caracal_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:caracal
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_cheetah_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_cheetah_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_cheetah_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_cheetah_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_equatorial_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_cheetah_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_cheetah_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:cheetah
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_lynx_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_lynx_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_lynx_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_lynx_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = migraddar_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = hyratan_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_lynx_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_lynx_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:lynx
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_panther_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_panther_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_panther_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_panther_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_panther_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_panther_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:panther
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_fossa_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_fossa_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_fossa_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_fossa_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_fossa_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_fossa_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fossa
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_goat_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_goat_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_goat_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_goat_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_ibex_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_tahr_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_markhor_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_goat_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_goat_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goat
		GH_hunt_activity_ibex_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_tahr_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_markhor_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_ibex_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_ibex_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_ibex_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_ibex_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = mayikprolollan_biozone
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = central_isles_biozone
				geographical_region = black_mountains_biozone
				geographical_region = western_opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = northern_opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = hyrea_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_mountains_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_ibex_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_ibex_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ibex
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_tahr_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_tahr_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_tahr_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_tahr_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = north_kharadan_biozone
				geographical_region = hyratan_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_tahr_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_tahr_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tahr
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_markhor_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_markhor_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_markhor_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = north_kharadan_biozone

			OR = {

		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20

}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:markhor
	}

GH_hunt_animal_hippopotamus_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_hippopotamus_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_hippopotamus_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_hippopotamus_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_hippopotamus_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_hippopotamus_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hippopotamus
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_rhinoceros_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rhinoceros
		GH_hunt_activity_karkadann_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_armazli_rhinoceros_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = kemsar_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 35
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_karkadann_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:karkadann
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amaghea_mountains_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 35
	}

GH_hunt_activity_armazli_rhinoceros_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:armazli_rhinoceros
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_primate_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_primate_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_primate_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_primate_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_monkey_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_gorilla_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_lemur_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_primate_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_primate_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:primate
		GH_hunt_activity_monkey_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_gorilla_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_lemur_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_monkey_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_monkey_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_monkey_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_monkey_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = cyrat_biozone
				geographical_region = rojihlat_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = katuppilan_biozone
				geographical_region = rovarska_biozone
				geographical_region = dahangon_lowlands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_monkey_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_monkey_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:monkey
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_gorilla_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_gorilla_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_gorilla_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_gorilla_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = cyrat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_gorilla_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gorilla
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_lemur_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_lemur_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_lemur_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_lemur_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_brown_lemur_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_black_lemur_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_indri_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_lemur_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_lemur_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:lemur
		GH_hunt_activity_ring-tailed_lemur_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_brown_lemur_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_black_lemur_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_indri_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 15
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_ring-tailed_lemur_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ring-tailed_lemur

GH_hunt_animal_bat_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_bat_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_bat_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_bat_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_bat_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_bat_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bat
		GH_hunt_activity_vampire_bat_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = central_isles_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_vampire_bat_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:vampire_bat
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_king_cobra_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_king_cobra_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_king_cobra_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_king_cobra_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = katuppilan_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = rovarska_biozone
				geographical_region = nightcoast_biozone
				geographical_region = dahangon_lowlands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:king_cobra
	}

	GH_hunt_animal_emperor_cobra_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_emperor_cobra_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_emperor_cobra_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {

			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes

			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}

GH_hunt_animal_rovarskan_dragon_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_rovarskan_dragon_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_rovarskan_dragon_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_rovarskan_dragon_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = rovarska_biozone
				geographical_region = nightcoast_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_great_rahksasa_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rovarskan_dragon
		GH_hunt_activity_great_rahksasa_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_great_rahksasa_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_great_rahksasa_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_great_rahksasa_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_great_rahksasa_native_range_trigger = {

			}

	GH_hunt_animal_crocodile_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_crocodile_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_crocodile_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = rojihlat_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = krehejad_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_pirate_coast
				geographical_region = dahangon_lowlands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

	OR = {

	GH_hunt_animal_wild_camel_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wild_camel_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wild_camel_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = boneyard_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}

	trigger_if = {

	GH_hunt_animal_waterfowl_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_waterfowl_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_waterfowl_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_whistling_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_goose_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_swan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_wader_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_loon_trigger = yes
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_waterfowl_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_waterfowl_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:waterfowl
		GH_hunt_activity_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_whistling_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_swan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_wader_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_loon_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_duck_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_duck_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_duck_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_duck_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_mallard_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_gadwall_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_teal_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_garganey_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_shelduck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_scaup_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_eider_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_tufted_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_scoter_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_velvet_scoter_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_long-tailed_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_goldeneye_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_smew_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_merganser_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_wigeon_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_black_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_goldenbill_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_spot-billed_duck_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_pochard_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_red-crested_pochard_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_duck_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_duck_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:duck
		GH_hunt_activity_mallard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_gadwall_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_teal_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_garganey_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_shelduck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_scaup_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_eider_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_tufted_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_scoter_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_velvet_scoter_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_long-tailed_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_goldeneye_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_smew_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_merganser_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_wigeon_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_black_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_goldenbill_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_kashiryan_spot-billed_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_pochard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_red-crested_pochard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_mallard_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_mallard_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_mallard_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_mallard_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_mallard_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_mallard_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mallard
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_gadwall_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_gadwall_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_gadwall_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_gadwall_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_gadwall_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_gadwall_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gadwall
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_teal_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_teal_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_teal_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_teal_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_teal_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_teal_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:teal
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_garganey_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_garganey_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_garganey_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_garganey_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_garganey_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_garganey_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:garganey
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_shelduck_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_shelduck_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_shelduck_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_shelduck_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_shelduck_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_aversaria
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shelduck
	}
