GH_hunt_animal_goldeneye_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_goldeneye_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_goldeneye_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_goldeneye_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_goldeneye_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_goldeneye_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goldeneye
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_smew_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_smew_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_smew_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_smew_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_smew_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_smew_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:smew
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_merganser_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_merganser_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_merganser_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_merganser_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_merganser_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_merganser_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:merganser
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_wigeon_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_wigeon_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wigeon_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wigeon_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_wigeon_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = pathos_delta_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
				geographical_region = kalath_redwoods_biozone
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
				geographical_region = vichacil_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_wigeon_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wigeon
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_pochard_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_pochard_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_pochard_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_pochard_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_pochard_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_pochard_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:pochard
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_red-crested_pochard_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_red-crested_pochard_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_red-crested_pochard_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_red-crested_pochard_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_red-crested_pochard_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_red-crested_pochard_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-crested_pochard
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_whistling_duck_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_whistling_duck_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_whistling_duck_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_whistling_duck_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_whistling_duck_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_whistling_duck_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_whistling_duck_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whistling_duck
		GH_hunt_activity_kashiryan_whistling_duck_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_whistling_duck_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_whistling_duck_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_whistling_duck_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_whistling_duck_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_dahangon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_whistling_duck
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_goose_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_goose_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_goose_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_goose_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_greylag_goose_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_barnacle_goose_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_brant_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_red-breasted_goose_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_khenemhat_goose_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_cotton_pygmy_goose_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_spur-winged_goose_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_goose_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_goose_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goose
		GH_hunt_activity_greylag_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_barnacle_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_brant_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_red-breasted_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_khenemhat_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_cotton_pygmy_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_spur-winged_goose_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_greylag_goose_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_greylag_goose_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_greylag_goose_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_greylag_goose_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_greylag_goose_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_greylag_goose_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:greylag_goose
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_barnacle_goose_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_barnacle_goose_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_barnacle_goose_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_barnacle_goose_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_barnacle_goose_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_barnacle_goose_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:barnacle_goose
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_brant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_brant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_brant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_brant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_marcher_kingdoms
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_brant_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_marcher_kingdoms
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_western_marcher_kingdoms
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_brant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brant
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_swan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_swan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_swan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_whooper_swan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_mute_swan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_tundra_swan_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_swan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_swan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:swan
		GH_hunt_activity_whooper_swan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_mute_swan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_tundra_swan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_whooper_swan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_whooper_swan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_whooper_swan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_whooper_swan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whooper_swan
	}

GH_hunt_animal_mute_swan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_mute_swan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_mute_swan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_mute_swan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_mute_swan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_mute_swan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mute_swan
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_wader_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wader_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_wader_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_grebe_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}

}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wader
		GH_hunt_activity_grebe_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_grebe_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_grebe_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_grebe_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_grebe_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_dabchick_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_grebe_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_grebe_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grebe
		GH_hunt_activity_dabchick_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_horned_grebe_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_silver_grebe_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_dabchick_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_dabchick_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_dabchick_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_dabchick_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_dahangon
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_equatorial_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_dabchick_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_dabchick_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dabchick
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_horned_grebe_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:horned_grebe
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_silver_grebe_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:silver_grebe
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_loon_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_loon_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_loon_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_loon_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_red-throated_loon_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_arctic_loon_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 35
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_loon_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_loon_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:loon
		GH_hunt_activity_common_loon_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_red-throated_loon_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_arctic_loon_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = lonely_light_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 35
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_loon
	}
}

				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria

		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }

			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:arctic_loon

GH_hunt_animal_gamebird_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_gamebird_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_gamebird_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_gamebird_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_quail_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_grouse_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_peafowl_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_partridge_trigger = yes
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_gamebird_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_gamebird_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gamebird
		GH_hunt_activity_quail_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_grouse_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_peafowl_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_quail_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_quail_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_quail_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_jungle_bush_quail_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_quail_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:quail
		GH_hunt_activity_common_quail_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_jungle_bush_quail_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = rojihlat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = dry_season } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_greater_aversaria
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = winter } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = rojihlat_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = crater_biozone
				geographical_region = aekershaan_biozone
				geographical_region = rojihlat_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = rainy_season } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_common_quail_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_quail
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_jungle_bush_quail_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_jungle_bush_quail_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_jungle_bush_quail_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_jungle_bush_quail_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_jungle_bush_quail_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:jungle_bush_quail
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_grouse_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_grouse_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_grouse_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_grouse_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_hazel_grouse_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_black_grouse_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_grouse_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_grouse_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grouse
		GH_hunt_activity_hazel_grouse_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_black_grouse_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_hazel_grouse_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_hazel_grouse_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_hazel_grouse_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_hazel_grouse_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = migraddar_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_hazel_grouse_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_hazel_grouse_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hazel_grouse
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_black_grouse_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_black_grouse_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_black_grouse_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_black_grouse_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = migraddar_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
				geographical_region = sulzegg_basin_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_black_grouse_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_grouse
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_peafowl_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_peafowl_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_peafowl_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_peafowl_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_common_peafowl_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_emperor_peafowl_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_peafowl_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_peafowl_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:peafowl
		GH_hunt_activity_common_peafowl_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_emperor_peafowl_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_common_peafowl_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_common_peafowl_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_common_peafowl_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_peafowl_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_peafowl_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_common_peafowl_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_peafowl
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_emperor_peafowl_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_emperor_peafowl_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_emperor_peafowl_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 50
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_emperor_peafowl_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_emperor_peafowl_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:emperor_peafowl
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_partridge_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_partridge_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_partridge_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_partridge_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_imperial_partridge_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_chukar_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_grey_partridge_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_snow_partridge_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_rock_partridge_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_sand_partridge_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_crested_partridge_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_mountain_bamboo_partridge_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_partridge_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_partridge_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:partridge
		GH_hunt_activity_imperial_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_chukar_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_grey_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_snow_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_rock_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_sand_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_crested_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_mountain_bamboo_partridge_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_imperial_partridge_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_imperial_partridge_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_imperial_partridge_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_imperial_partridge_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = southern_kalath_biozone
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = knokidbes_biozone
				geographical_region = hyrea_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_imperial_partridge_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_imperial_partridge_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:imperial_partridge
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_chukar_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_chukar_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_chukar_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_chukar_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = boneyard_biozone
				geographical_region = sirwali_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_mountains_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_chukar_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chukar
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_sand_partridge_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria
			}
			OR = {
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_shearwater_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_shearwater_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shearwater
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_flamingo_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_flamingo_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_flamingo_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_flamingo_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_ga_kashirya
				geographical_region = world_sarradon
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_flamingo_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:flamingo
	}

		GH_hunt_activity_crownbird_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}

	GH_hunt_animal_crownbird_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	GH_hunt_animal_ostrich_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_ostrich_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = damota_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone

			OR = {

	}

	OR = {

	GH_hunt_animal_exotic_bird_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	GH_hunt_animal_sunbird_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_sunbird_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_sunbird_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = magiyor_biozone
				geographical_region = kafasali_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}

}

GH_hunt_activity_sunbird_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sunbird
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_raptor_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_raptor_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_raptor_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_eagle_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_roc_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_falcon_trigger = yes

	GH_hunt_animal_eagle_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_eagle_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	}

}

	OR = {

		GH_hunt_activity_steppe_eagle_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_sarradonian_eagle_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }

GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = great_steppe_biozone
				geographical_region = brass_sea_coasts_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = kasiryat_biozone
				geographical_region = darmirat_plain_biozone
				geographical_region = kashti_flats_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_steppe_eagle_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:steppe_eagle
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = world_sarradon
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}

	OR = {

	GH_hunt_animal_roc_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_roc_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_roc_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = boneyard_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = khenemhat_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = amsar_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}

	}

	GH_hunt_animal_falcon_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_falcon_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_falcon_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:falcon
		GH_hunt_activity_royal_falcon_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = mayikprolollan_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:royal_falcon
	}

		GH_hunt_activity_tarasque_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}

GH_hunt_animal_giant_insect_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_adze_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_dire_mosquito_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_giant_bee_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_giant_spider_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_ukhinbooum_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_bhramar_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_myrmeke_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_false_hydra_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_ugkilrrrmag_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_ubir_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_insect
		GH_hunt_activity_adze_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_dire_mosquito_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_giant_bee_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_giant_spider_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_ukhinbooum_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_bhramar_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_myrmeke_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_false_hydra_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_ugkilrrrmag_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_ubir_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_adze_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_adze_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_adze_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = cyrat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_adze_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_adze_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:adze
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_dire_mosquito_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_dire_mosquito_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_dire_mosquito_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = cyrat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dire_mosquito
	}

	GH_hunt_animal_giant_spider_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

				geographical_region = GH_geographic_lonely_light
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_mayikprolollan
				geographical_region = GH_geographic_whisperveil
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }

	}

	GH_hunt_animal_ukhinbooum_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_ukhinbooum_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = brass_sea_coasts_biozone
				geographical_region = great_steppe_biozone
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
				geographical_region = redlands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ukhinbooum
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_giant_worm_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_giant_worm_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_giant_worm_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_dreadleech_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_devouring_worm_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_giant_worm_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_worm
		GH_hunt_activity_dreadleech_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_devouring_worm_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_dreadleech_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_dreadleech_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_manticore_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_manticore_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_manticore_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_manticore_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_malcoisic_manticore_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_shahmaran_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

}

		GH_hunt_activity_malcoisic_manticore_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_shahmaran_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_malcoisic_manticore_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_spriggan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_spriggan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_spriggan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_wood_woad_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_meadow_spriggan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_forest_spriggan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_leshen_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_wildfire_spriggan_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_cedar_spriggan_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_spriggan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spriggan
		GH_hunt_activity_wood_woad_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_meadow_spriggan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_forest_spriggan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_leshen_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_wildfire_spriggan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_cedar_spriggan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_wood_woad_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_wood_woad_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wood_woad_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wood_woad_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalathipsomi_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_wood_woad_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_wood_woad_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wood_woad
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_meadow_spriggan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_meadow_spriggan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_meadow_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_meadow_spriggan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalathipsomi_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_meadow_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_meadow_spriggan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:meadow_spriggan
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_forest_spriggan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_forest_spriggan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_forest_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_forest_spriggan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalathipsomi_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
				geographical_region = opakhasia_biozone
				geographical_region = western_aironoi_biozone
				geographical_region = foglands_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_forest_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_forest_spriggan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:forest_spriggan
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_leshen_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_leshen_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_leshen_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalath_old_growth_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}

		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}

	# Season Impact

	}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:leshen
	}

	GH_hunt_animal_wildfire_spriggan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wildfire_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wildfire_spriggan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kharadamat_biozone
				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
				geographical_region = ayyar_coast_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_mountains_biozone
				geographical_region = sarradonian_desert_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}

	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wildfire_spriggan
	}

	GH_hunt_animal_cedar_spriggan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_cedar_spriggan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_cedar_spriggan_native_range_trigger = {

		AND = {
			OR = {

				geographical_region = sinhamiyah_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}

	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact

	OR = {

GH_hunt_animal_elemental_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_elemental_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_elemental_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_elemental_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_rock_giant_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_living_blizzard_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_whisperwind_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_elemental_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_elemental_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:elemental
		GH_hunt_activity_rock_giant_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_living_blizzard_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_whisperwind_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_rock_giant_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_rock_giant_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_rock_giant_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_rock_giant_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = sarradonian_mountains_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_rock_giant_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rock_giant
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_living_blizzard_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_living_blizzard_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_living_blizzard_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_living_blizzard_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = north_kharadan_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_living_blizzard_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = north_kharadan_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = spring } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = north_kharadan_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_living_blizzard_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:living_blizzard
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_whisperwind_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_whisperwind_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_whisperwind_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_whisperwind_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = mayikprolollan_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = whisperveil_biozone
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_whisperwind_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = mayikprolollan_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = whisperveil_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = spring } }
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = mayikprolollan_biozone
				geographical_region = lichdoms_biozone
				geographical_region = whisperveil_biozone
			}
		}
		NOT = { GH_current_season_province_trigger = { SEASON = summer } }
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_whisperwind_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whisperwind
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_manzasiri_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_manzasiri_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_manzasiri_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_manzasiri_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = aironoian_southeast_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_manzasiri_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:manzasiri
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_valien_diamond_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_valien_diamond_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_valien_diamond_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_valien_diamond_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = guillate_rocks_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_valien_diamond_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_valien_diamond_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:valien_diamond
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_spirit_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_spirit_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_spirit_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_spirit_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_banshee_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_cor_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_djinn_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_shade_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_shetani_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_spirit_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_spirit_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spirit
		GH_hunt_activity_banshee_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_cor_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_djinn_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_shade_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_shetani_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_banshee_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_banshee_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_banshee_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_banshee_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
				geographical_region = alghazir_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
			county = {
				OR = {
					has_county_modifier = wayline_modifier
					has_county_modifier = wayline_intersection_modifier
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = eripomvuno_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_banshee_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_banshee_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:banshee
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_cor_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_cor_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	GH_hunt_animal_fortune_eater_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_fortune_eater_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {

			}
			county = {
				OR = {
					has_county_modifier = wayline_modifier
					has_county_modifier = wayline_intersection_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {

		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 1
	}

GH_hunt_animal_doyarchu_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_doyarchu_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_doyarchu_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_doyarchu_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = malcois_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_riverside_province = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 20
	}
}

}

GH_hunt_activity_doyarchu_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:doyarchu
	}
