GH_hunt_animal_leviathan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_leviathan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_leviathan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_leviathan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_swamp_leviathan_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_leviathan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_leviathan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:leviathan
		GH_hunt_activity_swamp_leviathan_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_swamp_leviathan_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_swamp_leviathan_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_swamp_leviathan_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_swamp_leviathan_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 40
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_swamp_leviathan_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_swamp_leviathan_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:swamp_leviathan
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_wyrm_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_wyrm_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_wyrm_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_wyrm_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = imperial_isle_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 30
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_wyrm_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_wyrm_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wyrm
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_troll_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_troll_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_troll_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_troll_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		GH_hunt_animal_forest_troll_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_troll_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_troll_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:troll
		GH_hunt_activity_forest_troll_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_forest_troll_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_forest_troll_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_forest_troll_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_forest_troll_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = kalathipsomi_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = chevalie_biozone
				geographical_region = konijkmener_biozone
				geographical_region = etepezea_biozone
				geographical_region = vyshtanka_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 25
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_forest_troll_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_forest_troll_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:forest_troll
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_ground_dweller_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_ground_dweller_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_ground_dweller_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_ground_dweller_native_range_trigger = {

				GH_any_underground_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}

	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }

	}

	OR = {

	GH_hunt_animal_morrigna_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_morrigna_seasonally_available_trigger = yes

	OR = {

GH_hunt_animal_nagual_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_nagual_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_nagual_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_nagual_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = cyrat_biozone
			}
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				is_coastal = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 10
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_nagual_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_nagual_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:nagual
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_slime_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_slime_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_slime_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_slime_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
		GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_slimeling_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_bloodslime_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_fireslime_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_death_jelly_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_mold_thing_trigger = yes
		GH_hunt_animal_ooze_trigger = yes
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_slime_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_slime_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slime
		GH_hunt_activity_common_slime_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_slimeling_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_bloodslime_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_fireslime_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_death_jelly_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_mold_thing_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
		GH_hunt_activity_ooze_trigger = { VAR = $VAR$ }
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_seasonally_available_trigger = {
	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact
	NOR = {
		has_province_modifier = winter_normal_modifier
		has_province_modifier = winter_harsh_modifier
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_common_slime_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_slime
	}
}

	GH_hunt_animal_slimeling_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_slimeling_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_slimeling_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }

	OR = {

	GH_hunt_animal_bloodslime_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_bloodslime_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_bloodslime_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			blood_aspect_province_value >= 4
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}

				GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes

				GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
				GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes

GH_hunt_animal_mold_thing_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_mold_thing_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_mold_thing_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_mold_thing_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			county = {
				OR = {
					has_county_modifier = wayline_modifier
					has_county_modifier = wayline_intersection_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { exists = barony }
		barony.title_capital_county.county_habitability_value >= 5
	}
}

	# Season Impact
	# Snow Impact

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mold_thing

			OR = {

GH_hunt_animal_sea_scorpion_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_sea_scorpion_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_sea_scorpion_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_sea_scorpion_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		is_coastal_sea_province = yes
	}
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = cyrat_sea_region
				geographical_region = dahagon_sea_region
				geographical_region = pirate_coast_sea_region
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_sea_scorpion_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sea_scorpion
	}

GH_hunt_animal_seal_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_seal_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_seal_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_seal_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		is_coastal_sea_province = yes
	}
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = arctic_sea_region
				geographical_region = lonely_ligh_sea_region
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_seal_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_seal_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:seal
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_abyssal_monstrosity_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_abyssal_monstrosity_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_abyssal_monstrosity_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_abyssal_monstrosity_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		is_sea_province = yes
	}
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = western_isles_sea_region
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_abyssal_monstrosity_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_abyssal_monstrosity_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:abyssal_monstrosity
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_sea_apparition_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_sea_apparition_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_sea_apparition_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_sea_apparition_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		is_sea_province = yes
	}
	OR = {
		AND = {
			OR = {
				geographical_region = western_isles_sea_region
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_sea_apparition_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_sea_apparition_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sea_apparition
	}
}
	
GH_hunt_animal_torkyll_trigger = {
	GH_hunt_animal_torkyll_native_range_trigger = yes
	GH_hunt_animal_torkyll_seasonally_available_trigger = yes
}

GH_hunt_animal_torkyll_native_range_trigger = {
	OR = {
		is_coastal_sea_province = yes
		is_sea_province = yes
	}
	OR = {
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_torkyll_seasonally_available_trigger = {
}

GH_hunt_activity_torkyll_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:torkyll
	}
}

# Creature Danger
GH_creature_danger_tier_01_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rabbit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:desert_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rodent
		$VAR$ ?= flag:porcupine
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mongoose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:three_toed_sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ring-tailed_lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:indri
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:vampire_bat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:waterfowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mallard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gadwall
		$VAR$ ?= flag:teal
		$VAR$ ?= flag:garganey
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shelduck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:scaup
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eider
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tufted_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:scoter
		$VAR$ ?= flag:velvet_scoter
		$VAR$ ?= flag:long-tailed_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goldeneye
		$VAR$ ?= flag:smew
		$VAR$ ?= flag:merganser
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wigeon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goldenbill_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_spot-billed_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:pochard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-crested_pochard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whistling_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_whistling_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whooper_swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mute_swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tundra_swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wader
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dabchick
		$VAR$ ?= flag:horned_grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:silver_grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-throated_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:arctic_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gamebird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:jungle_bush_quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hazel_grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:peafowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_peafowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:imperial_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chukar
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grey_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:snow_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rock_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:crested_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mountain_bamboo_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shearwater
		$VAR$ ?= flag:flamingo
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ground_bird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:exotic_bird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sunbird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:pooka
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wood_woad
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_slime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:seal
		$VAR$ ?= flag:abyssal_monstrosity
	}
}
GH_creature_danger_tier_02_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
		$VAR$ ?= flag:roe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:blackbuck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gazelle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_gazelle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fennec_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fossa
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ibex
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tahr
		$VAR$ ?= flag:markhor
		$VAR$ ?= flag:primate
		$VAR$ ?= flag:monkey
		$VAR$ ?= flag:snake
		$VAR$ ?= flag:king_cobra
		$VAR$ ?= flag:equine
		$VAR$ ?= flag:zebra
		$VAR$ ?= flag:camelid
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wild_camel
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:greylag_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:barnacle_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brant
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-breasted_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:khenemhat_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:cotton_pygmy_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spur-winged_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:emperor_peafowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ostrich
		$VAR$ ?= flag:raptor
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slimeling
		$VAR$ ?= flag:death_jelly
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sea_apparition
	}
}
GH_creature_danger_tier_03_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
		$VAR$ ?= flag:deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:true_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eastern_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fallow_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hog_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chital
		$VAR$ ?= flag:antelope
		$VAR$ ?= flag:oryx
		$VAR$ ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
		$VAR$ ?= flag:saiga
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dwarf_elephant
		$VAR$ ?= flag:steppe_wolf
		$VAR$ ?= flag:jackal
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kursha
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hyena
		$VAR$ ?= flag:snow_leopard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:clouded_leopard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:cheetah
		$VAR$ ?= flag:lynx
		$VAR$ ?= flag:reptile
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eagle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:steppe_eagle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sarradonian_eagle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:falcon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_insect
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dire_mosquito
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_bee
		$VAR$ ?= flag:devouring_worm
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bloodslime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mold_thing
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hippocampus

}

		$VAR$ ?= flag:emperor_cobra
		$VAR$ ?= flag:twin-serpent
		$VAR$ ?= flag:royal_falcon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_reptile

}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
	}
}

# Creature Prestige
GH_creature_prestige_tier_01_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rabbit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:desert_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rodent
		$VAR$ ?= flag:porcupine
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mongoose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:three_toed_sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fennec_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ibex
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tahr
		$VAR$ ?= flag:markhor
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:vampire_bat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:waterfowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mallard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gadwall
		$VAR$ ?= flag:teal
		$VAR$ ?= flag:garganey
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shelduck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:scaup
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eider
		$VAR$ ?= flag:long-tailed_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goldeneye
		$VAR$ ?= flag:merganser
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wigeon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_spot-billed_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:pochard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-crested_pochard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wader
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dabchick
		$VAR$ ?= flag:horned_grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-throated_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:arctic_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gamebird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:jungle_bush_quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hazel_grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:imperial_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chukar
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grey_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:snow_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rock_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spirit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_slime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slimeling
		$VAR$ ?= flag:death_jelly
		$VAR$ ?= flag:seal
	}
}

	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any

		$VAR$ ?= flag:ostrich
		$VAR$ ?= flag:raptor
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wood_woad
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bloodslime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ooze
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sea_apparition
	}
}

}

# Creature Provisions
GH_creature_provisions_tier_01_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rabbit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:desert_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rodent
		$VAR$ ?= flag:porcupine
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mongoose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:three_toed_sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fennec_fox
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ibex
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tahr
		$VAR$ ?= flag:markhor
		$VAR$ ?= flag:lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ring-tailed_lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_lemur
		$VAR$ ?= flag:indri
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:vampire_bat
		$VAR$ ?= flag:snake
		$VAR$ ?= flag:king_cobra
		$VAR$ ?= flag:swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whooper_swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mute_swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tundra_swan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wader
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dabchick
		$VAR$ ?= flag:horned_grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:silver_grebe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-throated_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:arctic_loon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gamebird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:jungle_bush_quail
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hazel_grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_grouse
		$VAR$ ?= flag:peafowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_peafowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:emperor_peafowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:imperial_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chukar
		$VAR$ ?= flag:grey_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:snow_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rock_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sand_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:crested_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mountain_bamboo_partridge
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shearwater
		$VAR$ ?= flag:flamingo
		$VAR$ ?= flag:ground_bird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:exotic_bird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sunbird
		$VAR$ ?= flag:vampire
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_insect
		$VAR$ ?= flag:dire_mosquito
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_bee
		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_spider
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spriggan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wood_woad
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spirit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:banshee
		$VAR$ ?= flag:djinn
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shade
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shetani
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fortune_eater
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:common_slime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:slimeling
		$VAR$ ?= flag:crystalline_wisp
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sea_apparition
		$VAR$ ?= flag:torkyll
	}
}
GH_creature_provisions_tier_02_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ = flag:any
		$VAR$ ?= flag:deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:true_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eastern_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fallow_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:roe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hog_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chital
		$VAR$ ?= flag:antelope
		$VAR$ ?= flag:blackbuck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gazelle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_gazelle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:oryx
		$VAR$ ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
		$VAR$ ?= flag:saiga
		$VAR$ ?= flag:monkey
		$VAR$ ?= flag:emperor_cobra
		$VAR$ ?= flag:waterfowl
		$VAR$ ?= flag:duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mallard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gadwall
		$VAR$ ?= flag:teal
		$VAR$ ?= flag:garganey
		$VAR$ ?= flag:shelduck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:scaup
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eider
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tufted_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:scoter
		$VAR$ ?= flag:velvet_scoter
		$VAR$ ?= flag:long-tailed_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goldeneye
		$VAR$ ?= flag:smew
		$VAR$ ?= flag:merganser
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wigeon
		$VAR$ ?= flag:black_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goldenbill_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_spot-billed_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:pochard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-crested_pochard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whistling_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:kashiryan_whistling_duck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:greylag_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:barnacle_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brant
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red-breasted_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:khenemhat_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:cotton_pygmy_goose
		$VAR$ ?= flag:spur-winged_goose

		$VAR$ ?= flag:giant_reptile

		$VAR$ ?= flag:meadow_spriggan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:forest_spriggan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:leshen
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wildfire_spriggan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:cedar_spriggan
		$VAR$ ?= flag:elemental
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rock_giant
		$VAR$ ?= flag:living_blizzard
		$VAR$ ?= flag:whisperwind
		$VAR$ ?= flag:cor
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gargoyle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:morrigna
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bloodslime
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fireslime

		$VAR$ ?= flag:mold_thing

		$VAR$ ?= flag:reef_automaton
		$VAR$ ?= flag:seal
		$VAR$ ?= flag:abyssal_monstrosity
	}

# Creatures Tags
GH_animal_type_standard_local_game_trigger = {
	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rabbit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_hare

		$VAR$ ?= flag:desert_hare

	OR = {
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:rabbit
		$VAR$ ?= flag:brown_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_hare
		$VAR$ ?= flag:desert_hare

		$VAR$ ?= flag:true_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:red_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:reacher_red_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:tragoneian_stag
		$VAR$ ?= flag:eastern_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:fallow_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sarradonian_royal_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:roe
		$VAR$ ?= flag:hog_deer
		$VAR$ ?= flag:chital
		$VAR$ ?= flag:antelope
		$VAR$ ?= flag:blackbuck
		$VAR$ ?= flag:gazelle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:white_gazelle
		$VAR$ ?= flag:oryx
		$VAR$ ?= flag:screwhorn_antelope
		$VAR$ ?= flag:saiga
		$VAR$ ?= flag:elk
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:three_toed_sloth
		$VAR$ ?= flag:opakhasian_bear
		$VAR$ ?= flag:bin_nalmicaa
		$VAR$ ?= flag:buffalo
		$VAR$ ?= flag:true_buffalo

		$VAR$ ?= flag:peninsular_buffalo

		$VAR$ ?= flag:bison
		$VAR$ ?= flag:wood_bison

		$VAR$ ?= flag:elephantid
		$VAR$ ?= flag:mammoth

		$VAR$ ?= flag:elephant
		$VAR$ ?= flag:damotan_elephant
		$VAR$ ?= flag:sarradonian_elephant

GH_hunt_killed_by_animal_trigger = {
	OR = {
		death_reason = death_sloth
		death_reason = death_three_toed_sloth
		death_reason = death_opakhasian_bear
		death_reason = death_bin_nalmicaa
		death_reason = death_buffalo
		death_reason = death_true_buffalo
		death_reason = death_bubalus

		death_reason = death_wood_bison

		death_reason = death_gorilla
		death_reason = death_crocodile

		death_reason = death_wild_camel

		death_reason = death_eagle

		death_reason = death_royal_falcon
